trends.name: Nuclear Renaissance
trends.description: The nuclear renaissance is transitioning from theoretical policy to tangible commercial deployment driven by AI energy requirements and institutional backing.
key_catalysts: AI-driven surge in baseload power demand
Institutional capital inflow from high-profile investors like ARK
Strategic deployment of SMR and micro-reactor prototypes in academic and commercial sectors

trends.name: Cybersecurity
trends.description: The cybersecurity landscape is shifting from external perimeter defense to a critical need for internal monitoring and Zero Trust due to rising insider threats.
key_catalysts: Rise of insider threats and rogue security professionals
Critical supply chain vulnerabilities in global manufacturing
Massive-scale data exfiltration targeting consumer platforms

trends.name: Crypto Bull
trends.description: Massive institutional capital inflows into ETFs and staking are creating significant supply-side pressure on major crypto assets.
key_catalysts: XRP ETF inflows exceeding $1 billion
Bitmine's $1 billion Ethereum staking supply squeeze
Institutional and political adoption initiatives

trends.name: AI Revolution
trends.description: The AI sector is transitioning from speculative hype to a phase of strategic consolidation and nuanced product refinement.
key_catalysts: Strategic M&A activity and consolidation (Nvidia/SoftBank)
Product differentiation through enhanced human-AI interaction features
Widespread enterprise adoption for operational efficiency

trends.name: Quantum Computing
trends.description: The shift from large-scale laboratory setups to miniaturized, chip-based quantum hardware is accelerating the path to commercial viability and national security integration.
key_catalysts: Miniaturization of quantum processors to chip-scale dimensions
Geopolitical competition for technological supremacy between US and China
Strategic infrastructure development in domestic hardware manufacturing

trends.name: Space Economy
trends.description: The space economy is transitioning from exploration to a high-frequency commercial race characterized by intense international competition and emerging ESG regulatory pressures.
key_catalysts: Expansion of the 2026 mission pipeline and commercial launch schedules
Intensifying global competition from Chinese private aerospace firms
Development of sustainable satellite technologies to address orbital debris

trends.name: Obesity Drugs
trends.description: Le passage aux formes orales et l'élargissement des indications thérapeutiques (addiction) compensent les pressions sur les prix et les incertitudes politiques.
key_catalysts: Approbation par la FDA de la version orale du Wegovy
Expansion potentielle des indications vers le traitement des addictions
Pénétration accrue du marché chinois malgré les baisses de prix

trends.name: Reshoring
trends.description: Les cyberattaques sur les fournisseurs étrangers et l'insécurité logistique agissent comme des catalyseurs majeurs pour la relocalisation des activités critiques.
key_catalysts: Vulnérabilités cybernétiques des chaînes d'approvisionnement offshore
Augmentation des risques logistiques et vols de fret internationaux
Consolidation stratégique des fournisseurs de matériaux de construction domestiques

trends.name: CeDeFi RWA Infrastructure
trends.description: Integration of centralized and decentralized finance to facilitate the 'Exchange of Everything' via Real World Asset tokenization. It aims to build a global financial infrastructure for non-traditional asset trading.
key_catalysts: Launch of All InX platform
Regulatory clarity on tokenized assets

trends.name: Regional Bank Recapitalization
trends.description: Consolidation of regional banks supported by strategic private equity investments to enhance scale and profitability. This trend focuses on restructuring balance sheets and absorbing smaller cooperative entities.
key_catalysts: Warburg Pincus strategic investment
Swiss franc restructuring
Cooperative bank mergers

trends.name: Inclusive Digital Housing Finance
trends.description: Expansion of mortgage lending in emerging markets through digital-first, inclusive platforms. This leverages technology to reach underserved populations in high-growth regions like India.
key_catalysts: Digital infrastructure maturity in India
Nifty consolidation near 26,000
